ocean.question: I wave, but I have no hands. I have sand at my edge. What am I?

hints.text: 🌊 I am big and blue.
🏖️ You can build sandcastles near me.
🚢 Boats float on me.

ocean.question: I swim in the ocean, have fins, and say 'glub glub'. What am I?

hints.text: 🐠 I am a type of animal.
💧 I live underwater.
🍽️ People sometimes eat me.

ocean.question: I have a shell and live in the sea. I move very slowly. What am I?

hints.text: 🐌 I am a type of snail.
🏠 I carry my home on my back.
🥗 I like to eat plants that grow in the water.

ocean.question: I'm big and grey, swim in the ocean, and blow water out of a hole on my head. What am I?

hints.text: 🐳 I am a very big mammal.
🎶 I can sing songs underwater.
💨 I breathe air like you, but I live in the ocean.

ocean.question: I have eight arms and live in the ocean. I can squeeze into small spaces. What am I?

hints.text: 🐙 I am an invertebrate.
🎨 I can change my color to hide.
🧠 Some people think I am very smart.

ocean.question: I have a hard shell and walk sideways on the sand. I pinch with my claws. What am I?

hints.text: 🦀 I am a crustacean.
🚶 I move in a funny direction.
🌊 I live near the shore.

ocean.question: I'm a fish with a long, pointy nose like a sword. What am I?

hints.text: 🗡️ My nose is used for hunting.
🌊 I am a fast swimmer.
🍴 People like to eat me.

ocean.question: I am a very big, scary fish with sharp teeth. People are sometimes scared of me. What am I?

hints.text: 🦈 I am a predator.
🦷 I have many rows of teeth.
🌊 I have cartilage instead of bones.

ocean.question: I am a colorful sea creature with stinging tentacles. What am I?

hints.text: 🎐 I drift in the water.
🚫 Do not touch me.
⭐ I am not a fish.

ocean.question: I am a baby sea turtle. I hatch from an egg on the beach, then I race to the ocean. What am I called?

hints.text: 👶 I am very small.
🐢 I am a young reptile.
🏃 I have to be fast to get to the water.

food.question: I am yellow, and monkeys love to peel me. What am I?

hints.text: 🐒 Monkeys like to eat me!
💛 My color is like the sun.
🛥️ You peel my skin off before eating me.

food.question: I am long and orange, and bunnies love to eat me. What am I?

hints.text: 🐇 I am a bunny's favorite snack!
🥕 My color is like a pumpkin.
🌱 I grow in the ground.

food.question: I am white and cold, and you scream for me in the summer. What am I?

hints.text: 🍦 I am a sweet treat.
🥶 I am kept in the freezer.
☀️ I am perfect for a hot day.

food.question: I am round and red, and I grow on trees. Sometimes I am green. What am I?

hints.text: 🍎 Snow White ate one.
🌳 I hang from branches.
🥧 You can make a pie with me.

food.question: I am made of dough, and I have a hole in the middle. You can put sprinkles on me. What am I?

hints.text: 🍩 Homer Simpson likes to eat me!
🕳️ I have a round opening.
🎉 I am a treat you might get at a party.

food.question: I am a fruit that is purple or green, and I grow on vines. What am I?

hints.text: 🍇 You can squish me to make juice.
🪴 I grow in bunches.
🍷 I am used to make wine.

food.question: I am a vegetable, and I make you cry when you cut me. What am I?

hints.text: 🧅 My layers make you weep.
🇫🇷 I am important in French cooking.
🧄 I am related to garlic.

food.question: I am a long vegetable with many seeds inside. Sometimes I am yellow. What am I?

hints.text: 🌽 My kernels are often eaten off the cob.
🎬 Movies are often eaten with me.
🍿 Pop me and I become popcorn.

food.question: I am a fruit with a fuzzy skin and sweet green flesh inside. What am I?

hints.text: 🥝 I have tiny black seeds.
🇳🇿 I am named after a bird from New Zealand.
🪒 My skin is brown and hairy

food.question: I am a warm and fuzzy drink made from cacao seeds. What am I?

hints.text: 🍫 You can make me with milk and sugar
🇲🇽 The Mayans drank me a long time ago
🔥 I am often served in a mug
